bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Marc Edelman was involved in various progressive organizations, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains flyers and correspondence concerning organizations Marc Edelman was involved in, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective). Also included is one file containing correspondence regarding a student riot at the High School of Music and Art and an issue of the Washington Free Press dealing with Students for a Democratic Society (SDS) action against the Pentagon. PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: peter.filardo@nyu.edu

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
